description:
For those seeking a more natural feel and versatile look in their adventure-ready wardrobe, think Double Peak—perfect for those who want something more laid back while still providing full functionality in the outdoors.

This short is packed with performance details that will have you feeling like you can take on whatever the day (or week?) throws your way. And because we know you love the great outdoors, you'll be happy to hear it's made using planet-friendly materials. Like they say, leave nothing but footprints...
name: Prana Double Peak Shorts, 8" Inseam - Mens
